Title: Content-Spoofing in "files" app

CWE.name: User Interface (UI) Misrepresentation of Critical Information

Description: The top navigation bar displayed in the files list contained partially user-controllable input leading to a potential misrepresentation of information.
ActionTaken: The user-controlled content is now not trusted anymore unless the folder structure exists on the file system.
Resolution: It is recommended that all instances are upgraded to Nextcloud 9.0.55 or 10.0.2.
